name: Styling Cream for Curly & Coily Hair
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Styling Products
about: What it is:An oil-rich styling cream that provides superior moisture penetration and touchable hold while preventing breakage..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Curl-Enhancing.Key Benefits:- Provides touchable hold and superior moisture penetration.Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Styling Cream provides superior moisture penetration and touchable hold when setting hairstyles: twist outs, braid outs, Bantu knots, wash-and-gos. Shea butter, cacay oil, and sweet almond oil nourish the hair while preventing breakage and damage.
ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Ceteareth-20, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, PEG-120 Methyl Glucose Dioleate, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Potassium Carbonate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Caryodendron Orinocense Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Ethylhexylglycerin, Caprylyl Glycol, Polysorbate 60, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Disodium EDTA, Disodium Phosphate, Sodium Phosphate, Sodium Benzoate, Benzyl Alcohol, Phenethyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Sulfite, Fragrance/Parfum, Benzyl Benzoate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Amyl Cinnamal, Hydroxycitronellal, Linalool, Citronellol, Limonene, Coumarin.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply on wet or dry hair as you style or braid.. .Pro tip: .-For protective styles, use to seal the hair with moisture before styling..-For locs, apply cream as you retwist each strand for shine, definition, and hold.

reviews.review_text: I received a gift card to select a product of my choice to review.
